summary: Water quality is stable but TDS is slightly elevated compared to the 7-day average.

insights.recommendation: Maintain current pH; ideal range for tilapia is 6.5-8.5.
Consider partial water change to lower TDS levels; optimal range is 200-400 ppm.
Maintain temperature; ideal range for tilapia is 25-30°C.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.034 / 7.025 / 7.043 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 339.3 / 328.4 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.265 / 27.25 / 27.31 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
